description: This was a very practical and smart young man. He tried various jobs during his life and came to conclusion that it was money that mattered. At least he didn't lose his moral compass and loathed some of the shady jobs he did in the past. The guy learned how to negotiate while working as a sales representative, so it wasn't easy to bargain with him. I was lucky his girlfriend dumped him recently and, as a farewell gift, she left a substantial debt on his poor shoulders. The guy needed money badly and I had plenty in store. First, I gave him an amazing job and then made him an offer he couldn't refuse. He simply asked for more money and then agreed to become my sex toy. I was super horny, so the interview became a bit too hardcore for his taste. Well, virgins don't have it easy at my office...
title: Dirty Scout 216
